files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,17 @@
+// rustfmt-wrap_comments: true
+
+// Preserve two trailing whitespaces in doc comment,
+// but trim any whitespaces in normal comment.
+
+//! hello world  
+//! hello world 
+
+/// hello world    
+/// hello world 
+/// hello world  
+fn foo() {
+    // hello world  
+    // hello world 
+    let x = 3;
+    println!("x = {}", x);
+}
